Landing.netflix_streaming: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more.
Landing.watch_netflix: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from $6.99 to $19.99 a month.
Landing.you_can_watch: You can watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Netflix account to watch instantly on the web at netflix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device.
Landing.netflix_flexible: Netflix is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks.
Landing.what_can_i_watch_on_netflix: What can I watch on Netflix?
Landing.netflix_extensive: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netflix originals, and more.
Landing.netflix_kids: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies.
Landing.why_am_i_seeing_this_language: Why am I seeing this language?
Landing.your_browser: Your browser language preferences or location determine the default language shown. You can change it in settings.
